parameters.name: DomainName
parameters.description: You can specify multiple domain names and separate them with commas (,). You can specify a maximum of 500 domain names in each call.

parameters.name: EndTime
parameters.description:
The end of the time range to query.

Specify the time in the ISO 8601 standard in the yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ssZ format. The time must be in UTC.

>  The end time must be later than the start time.

parameters.name: IspNameEn
parameters.description: The name of the ISP. If you do not set this parameter, all ISPs are queried.

parameters.name: LocationNameEn
parameters.description: The name of the region. If you do not set this parameter, data in all regions is queried.

parameters.name: StartTime
parameters.description:
The beginning of the time range to query.

Specify the time in the ISO 8601 standard in the yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ssZ format. The time must be in UTC.
